public delegate void NotificationsSentHandler(PSContextInfo ^ contextInfo, NotificationsPostSendEventArgs ^ e);

Docs.param: Contains the Project Server context information.
Docs.summary: Event handler for the Notifications Sent post-event.

remarks.para: For an example of changing e-mail by using the NotificationsSending pre-event, see How to: Customize E-Mail for Project Server Notifications
